title: I still really don't understand this game
body:
I've played this game, I've played heroes of the storm, and a few others.

Can someone please explain to me

How does it make sense that a someone who has tank and damage items, can defeat someone who has only built tanky or dps?

Few examples such as riven, garen, darius, pantheon, Lee sin etc.

Every game, one of them is harder to get rid of than cancer, but in that same breath they're doing insane amounts of damage.
It doesn't make logical sense.
Why does anyone play assassins if tanky dps can just do damage and almost never die, seems like a pretty op deal.

In heroes, literally all of the assassins are squishy, or have shit escapes, but they do good damage.
In heroes, literally all of the tanks do shit all damage, but they're hard as shit to kill.
In LoL, someone plays Garen or Darius, builds certain items and is basically both.
um?

replies.body:
I recommend you challenge the meta! This is the kind of thinking we need in League. Bruiser ADC and roaming support was the NA meta in Season 1. To be honest I still struggle against Mordekaiser ADC ;)

But in case you were looking for an actual answer; it's because most of these guys can either be kited, or they fall off in the late game (sometimes both).

+ The problem is most of us low elo players can't really kite at all, and we often get paired with teams who don't understand how to help ADC's kite. 

 Once you get to higher elos bruisers get really hard to play, because some games you literally can't touch the back line. Just ask anyone Diamond or above what playing against a good {{champion:40}} **Janna** is like.

If you want to beat bruisers as a squishy, you need to pay attention to your positioning in fights. Also, if you ever get engaged on and find a **Darius** right next to you, don't try and outplay or tank a few hits. You need to immediately flash or use a gap closer (assuming he's used his hook).

I honestly recommend you play tanks and bruisers in low elos though, ADC is a hard role if you don't have good mechanics.
